scenario_text.value:
Goddammit! How could they do this to Miu’s
peeps like this?!

This is bad, real bad. How would she feel if
she saw this for herself?

They won’t get away with this. When I find
’em, heads are gonna freakin’ ROLL!

Hey, Miyuki might’ve been the one who did
this, you know.

So what?! Don’t expect me to keep my mouth
shut if she’s done all this!

(Oh no, Kaito’s losing it. I’ve got to do
something to cool him off.)

(Should I insist on saving Miyuki? Or maybe
if I focus on the rescue effort he’ll chill?)

(If I remind him that we came to talk to
Jijimon, that might do the trick...)
(To calm Kaito down, I’ll say...)
I want to save Miyuki.
Rescue comes first.
Jijimon comes first.
I want to save Miyuki.

I want to save Miyuki. You feel the same,
don’t you, Kaito?
Well yeah, but that’s... Aaagh!

That doesn’t change the fact that she’s
making Miu sad!

What am I supposed to do with all this rage
I’m feeling?!

You got every right to be pissed, Kaito. Just
don’t take it out on the wrong chumps, okay?

Shit... Yeah, I got you. I ain’t gonna do
nothin’ that lame.

(Somewhere to vent his feelings... I can’t
tell where that should be, either.)
Rescue comes first.

Of course you’re angry, Kaito, but the rescue
effort comes first.

Any time we waste around here may be time
those little guys don’t have.

Yeah... Yeah, you’re right. It’s just as you
say, man.

My bad, I just saw red there for a sec. We
gotta save them all—for Miu’s sake, too.

(I’m glad he’s calmed down, but of course it
was all for Miu.)
Jijimon comes first.

Calm down, Kaito. First things first, we have
to talk to Jijimon, right?

If there’s a way to save Miyuki, we can stop
this kind of thing from happening.
I know... I know, dammit! It’s just...!

Arrrgh! I don’t care if it’s the Master or
whatever, someone’s gonna pay, I tell ya!

(Umm... I think that just pissed him off even
more.)

Well, we ain’t going nowhere until we save
the squirts around here first.

Let’s go, Dracmon. We’ll find those little
punks if it’s the last thing we do.

Hee hee, sounds like you’re looking for
a fight, man, but I got you. Let’s do this!

Leave the guys around here to me. You go off
and rescue the others.
